_sText:
Map Created by Max_power



Put the maps folder into your cstrike folder.

New Features in V2

- Added more realistic lighting.
- More Ct spawns and less t spawns.
- More sounds for traps.
- Made the gun room better.
- changed some traps.

Bug Fixes

- Cts can no longer hug the windows to avoid traps.
- All players start with a knife at the start of every round.
- Stopped possible boosting to area with shotguns.
- People trapped in jail can no longer press the button which activates a trap.
